Package shape

Class Cone

java.lang.Object
shape.Shape3D
shape.Cone
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Shape3D>
public class Cone extends Shape3D
Represents a cone shape. The cone is defined by its radius and height. Provides methods for retrieving properties of the cone such as height, base area, and volume.
